name: Simple Code Generator (SCG)
tagline: Simple Code Generator (SCG) generates code automatically from models written in a very simple syntax (or from C/C++ structs/classes). This is based entirely on the approach of model-based-programming and saves a lot of time by generating code that is always similar anyway.
body:
simple-code-generator
=====================

Simple Code Generator (SCG) generates code automatically from models written in a very simple syntax (or from C/C++ structs/classes). This is based entirely on the approach of model-based-programming and saves a lot of time by generating code that is always similar anyway.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
